title: Southport crash: Woman dead after crashing into building
text:
An elderly woman has died after she suffered a suspected medical episode at the wheel and crashed into a building on the Gold Coast.

Police are investigating after the incident at Nerang St in Southport this morning.

“Preliminary information indicates the 78-year-old female driver was travelling along Little High St when it’s suspected she suffered a medical episode, causing her to collide with a building,” police said in a statement.

She sustained significant injuries and was treated by paramedics at the scene but died.

No one else was injured as a result of the crash, but the building sustained minor damage.

Nerang St has since been cleared.
description: An elderly woman has died after she suffered a suspected medical episode at the wheel and crashed into a building on the Gold Coast.
